name: CCDTimeSaver
summary: basic A short description of CCDTimeSaver.
description: TODO: Add long description of the pod here.
prepare_command:
echo '        #!/bin/sh

        if [[ -d CCDTimeSaver.framework ]]; then
          echo "Tdfire: CCDTimeSaver.framework is not empty"
          exit 0
        fi

        if [[ ! -d tdfire_download_temp ]]; then
          mkdir tdfire_download_temp
        fi

        cd tdfire_download_temp

        curl --fail -O -J -v http://iosframeworkserver-shopkeeperclient.app.2dfire.com/download/CCDTimeSaver/0.1.2

        if [[ -f CCDTimeSaver.framework.zip ]]; then
          echo "Tdfire: copying CCDTimeSaver.framework ..."

          unzip CCDTimeSaver.framework.zip
          cp -fa CCDTimeSaver.framework ../
        fi

        cd ..
        rm -fr tdfire_download_temp

        echo "pod cache path for CCDTimeSaver: $(pwd)"
' > download.sh && sh download.sh && rm download.sh
